function.name: rotate_to_angle
function.description: Rotates the robot to a specific angle using gyroscope feedback for precision.

target_angle.description: The target angle in degrees. Positive values rotate clockwise, negative values rotate counter-clockwise. Use values between -180 and 180 degrees for best results.

function.name: move_distance
function.description: Moves the robot forward or backward by a specific distance.

distance_cm.description: The distance to move in centimeters. Positive values move forward, negative values move backward. Recommended range is between -100 and 100 cm for accurate movement.

function.name: view_surroundings
function.description: Takes a picture with the robot's camera and analyzes what's visible in the environment.

function.name: change_posture
function.description: Changes the robot's posture to stay low or shake hands.

posture.description: The posture to change to: 'stay_low' or 'shake_hands'.

function.name: eye_spy
function.description: Play a game of eye spy by looking around and describing an object for the user to guess.

action.description: Whether to start a new game or check a user's guess.

user_guess.description: The user's guess of what object is being described (only needed for check_guess action).

function.name: robot_trivia
function.description: The robot asks trivia questions related to technology and checks the user's answers.

user_answer.description: The user's answer to the trivia question.

correct_answer.description: The correct answer to the trivia question, as determined by the LLM.
